statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections;
SELECT product_name, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_result = TRUE;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM quality_control_inspections GROUP BY inspector_name;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT inspection_id, product_name, inspection_result FROM quality_control_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_result = true;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Inspections FROM quality_control_inspections GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_logs;
SELECT product_id, inspector_name, quality_score FROM quality_control_logs WHERE inspector_name = 'Alice';
SELECT product_name, batch_number, storage_location FROM products ORDER BY batch_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01' AND storage_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_logs WHERE quality_score >= 8 ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_logs WHERE quality_score > 8.0 ORDER BY inspection_date DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY manufacturing_date ASC
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inspections FROM quality_control_logs GROUP BY inspector_name ORDER BY total_inspections DESC
SELECT product_name, batch_number, storage_location FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND manufacturing_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT inspector_name, AVG(quality_score) AS avg_quality_score FROM quality_control_logs GROUP BY inspector_name HAVING AVG(quality_score) > 7.0 ORDER BY avg_quality_score DESC
SELECT * FROM quality_control_log;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date, category FROM products;
SELECT inspector_id, first_name, email FROM inspectors;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_id, notes FROM quality_control_log WHERE quality_issue_flag = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_log;
SELECT product_id, category FROM products WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT inspector_id, first_name, email FROM inspectors ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(manufacturing_date) AS latest_manufacturing_date, category FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT product_name, inspection_date, notes FROM products p JOIN quality_control_log q ON p.product_id = q.product_id WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM quality_logs;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name, inspection_result FROM quality_logs;
SELECT inspector_name, remarks FROM quality_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, category FROM products;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspector_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM quality_logs WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC, log_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, category FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT inspector_name, department FROM inspectors ORDER BY inspector_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM products JOIN inspections ON products.product_id = inspections.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email, inspector_phone FROM inspectors ORDER BY inspector_name DESC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspection_result FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspection_result = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM inspections_history WHERE inspection_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_inspections WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, product_type, manufacturer_name FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email, supervisor_id FROM inspectors WHERE inspector_id = 1;
SELECT error_description, error_type FROM inspection_errors WHERE inspection_id = 10;
SELECT inspection_id, product_id, inspection_result FROM inspections_history ORDER BY inspection_date DESC LIMIT 5;
